title: Agricraft农业工艺杂草怎么关
txt_content: 农业工艺的杂草怎么关？

replies.author: Flameworks
replies.txt_content:
打开.minecraft\config\agricraft\Configuration.cfg(最好使用Notepad++打开)，找到130行的
    
    # set to false if you wish to disable weeds [default: true]
    B:"Enable weeds"=true

将B:"Enable weeds"=true改为B:"Enable weeds"=false即可
